title: Max & Moritz II
author: Ronald
hint: A nice level, where you will use your improved skills.

title: Double Helix
author: Erik
hint: Find your ways through this twisted tunnel (using some involuntary help from the inhabitants).

title: Infinity
author: Erik
hint: I'm sure you can solve this level in less than infinite time.
map: # R G E            #2Y1#            E R G #

title: Double-Decker
author: Alexander, Reinhard
hint: It seems to me, that you need some double play in the middle section of this game.

title: Camillo Sitte
author: Erik
hint: Have a wonderful day in the city. You just have to see every street and every place!

title: Two are Busy
author: Erik
hint: The hourglass will not turn around.

title: Pipemania
author: Erik
